channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Escape From Tarkov’ Now On Steam, But You’ll Have To Buy It Again
item.description: Escape From Tarkov is officially on Steam for the first time, but if you already own the game you’ll need to buy it again.

item.title: If You Think AI Is Special, You’re Already Two Steps Behind
item.description: Judging by the current hype around artificial intelligence (AI), you would think it was invented yesterday. In fact, the concept has been around for d...

item.title: New Research On Aging And Inflammation Offers Hope For Healthier Lives
item.description: New scientific findings reveal that healthy aging may be possible by managing chronic inflammation—a phenomenon now called “inflammaging.”

item.title: Crystals Reveal Link Between Space And The Evolution Of Earth’s Crust
item.description: The chemistry of tiny ancient crystals may capture the rhythm of meteorite impacts during our solar system’s passage through space.

item.title: Disappointing News About ‘Adolescence’ Season 2 On Netflix
item.description: Despite being a limited series, Adolescence may get a season 2, but there is a bit of disappointing news on that front.

item.title: Before we learn a new skill
item.description: The pre-work involves important choices: Skip these steps and you might as well not bother to begin.

item.title: New post
item.description: There’s a button in WordPress that initiates a new post. And another that publishes it. That’s a clear and practical metaphor for what we do, all day,...

item.title: Often give in
item.description: In an oft-quoted speech, Winston Churchill said: Never give in–never, never, never, never, in nothing great or small, large or petty, never give in ex...

item.title: Kinds of reckless
item.description: Worth noting that there’s no ‘w’ in reckless. We imagine there might be, since a wreck is entirely possible. There’s the recklessness of creative gene...

item.title: No time?
item.description: It’s easy to announce that we don’t have time for a new skill or a generous act. But the truth is we probably could find the time. What we don’t have ...
